title: My CAO
description: Here you can find more information about the introduction of the new CAO and the choices you can make within the KPN Flex and Boost plans.

flex.title: FLEX
listItems: Monthly payment of holiday allowance (8%) and thirteenth month (2%, from January 2025 6.33%)
Participation in KPN plan or KPN sales plan/retail plan

boost.title: BOOST
listItems: Invest €1250 in physical and mental well-being (per year)
Invest €5000 in making your home more sustainable (per 3 years)
Pay off up to €5000 of your student debt (per 2 years)

questionnaire: Need help making your choice? Take this questionnaire!
